data.name: Encabezado_borrado
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete the information for the selected sensor?

data.name: Encabezado_creacion
data.value: Enter the information for the new sensor below

data.name: Encabezado_detalles
data.value: The information for the selected sensor is shown below

data.name: Encabezado_edicion
data.value: Modify the information you want to edit in the sensor below

data.name: Sensor_creado_error
data.value: The sensor {0} has not been created.

data.name: Sensor_creado_exito
data.value: The sensor {0} has been successfully created.

data.name: Sensor_editado_error
data.value: The sensor {0} has not been edited.

data.name: Sensor_editado_exito
data.value: The sensor {0} has been successfully edited.

data.name: Sensor_eliminado_error
data.value: The sensor {0} has not been deleted.

data.name: Sensor_eliminado_exito
data.value: The sensor {0} has been successfully deleted.

data.name: Error_valor
data.value: Any of the entered values (default value, minimum or maximum) does not have the specified data type; please check these values and try again.

data.name: Min_mayor_que_Max
data.value: The minimum value can not be greater than the maximum value.

data.name: Valor_defecto_fuera_rango
data.value: The default value must be between the maximum and minimum values.

data.name: Problema_dashboard
data.value: There is a problem with the dashboard for the {0} sensor type; please, try again later.

data.name: Info_guardar
data.value: Click here to save the information

data.name: Info_papelera
data.value: Drag a sensor or segment here and drop to remove it or click this button to remove selected items or all of them is nothing is selected.

data.name: Info_volver
data.value: Click here to return without saving the changes

data.name: Seleccione_sensor
data.value: Select a sensor from the list:

data.name: Mensaje_ayuda_1
data.value: To display the sensor information, hover the pointer over the sensor.

data.name: Mensaje_ayuda_2
data.value: If you are using a touch device (smartphone or tablet) you must keep the sensor pressed until the window with the information has been displayed (1s approx.).

data.name: Mensaje_ayuda_3
data.value: The window with the information will remain open until you open another one or click on any area of the plane.

data.name: Mensaje_ayuda_4
data.value: To enter editing mode (if you are not using mobile devices), click on the icon in the upper left part of the map.

data.name: Mensaje_ayuda_5
data.value: To add a new sensor or segment, drag it from the column on the left and drop it on the plan. A window will be opened where you can select one of the available sensors of that type in that location (if none appears, you must create it before in the sensors section). You can create a new segment by pressing the "New Segment" button.

data.name: Mensaje_ayuda_6
data.value: If you want to edit a sensor of those added to the plan, click on it. The previous window will appear again to be able to select another sensor.

data.name: Mensaje_ayuda_7
data.value: To remove a sensor or segment, drag it to the trash bin located in the actions column. To delete selected items or ALL of them if nothing is selected, click on the trash bin icon directly.

data.name: Mensaje_ayuda_8
data.value: To save the information, click on the "diskette" icon in the actions column.

data.name: Mensaje_ayuda_9
data.value: If you want to go back without saving the edited changes, click on the icon with the arrow to the left in the actions column.

data.name: Mensaje_ayuda_10
data.value: Said window can be dragged across the screen to change its position to convenience. To do this, with the window open, click on the top gray bar (where the name of the sensor appears) and without dropping it, drag it.

data.name: No_conectado_broker
data.value: It has not been possible to connect to the broker; please, reload the page.

data.name: Subscripcion_abortada
data.value: There is no connection with the broker, subscription to the topic aborted.

data.name: Mensaje_ayuda_11
data.value: To begin, select the location which you want to obtain a general summary of sensorization.

data.name: Mensaje_ayuda_12
data.value: If the selected location has a map, it will be represented with all the sensors that have been located in it. If you click on any sensor, all the information boxes (those containing the graphics) will automatically be closed, leaving only the sensor in question open. This way you can clearly identify which box belongs to which sensor.

data.name: Mensaje_ayuda_13
data.value: For sensors that return numerical data (integer or floating), a graph of lines is shown (to the left) where the evolution of the data received is represented together with the average of all these data (if you want to display only one of them, click on the legend of the line that you do not want to see on the graph); another (to the right) semicircular where it represents the minimum and maximum value reached by the sensor as well as a percentage that represents at what point the last value received is (respect to the minimum and maximum).

data.name: Mensaje_ayuda_14
data.value: For sensors that return boolean data, a table with information and a graph showing the percentage of time (in relation to the total) carried by the sensor in each of its possible states (ON/OFF, open/closed, etc.) is displayed.

data.name: Mensaje_ayuda_15
data.value: If the screen is wide enough (more than 1700 px) the information will be displayed divided into two (on the left the map and on the right the graphs); if you want to see everything in a single column (the graphs will look larger) reduce the width of the browser window.

data.name: Compruebe_ubicacion
data.value: If there is no location to select, first check if any location with devices and sensors associated exists. If it does not exist, please create one.

data.name: Compruebe_empresa
data.value: There is no company to select because there are no companies which have locations with associated devices and sensors; please create one.

data.name: Compruebe_entidad
data.value: There is no entity to select because there are no entities which have locations with associated devices and sensors; create one please.

data.name: Mensaje_ayuda_seleccion
data.value: You can click on a sensor or segment icon in the plane to select it, click the "Select all icons" button to select all of them or click the "Deselect all icons" button to deselect all. Once the icons have been selected, they will be shown with the green border in the case of the segments, or the green icon in the case of the sensors. You can change the position of all the selected icons in the map simultaneously using the W, S, A, D keys (Up, Down, Left and Right respectively).
